Posts.EditableText:
I have been having problems with containers. I finally figured out why. When you define the word remove as a verb
ie remove a worn piece of clothing. Then it messes up any container that you have in the game that you had set to make objects removable.
Is there any way around this? Or will I just have to make a remove command for every object in the game?
Thanks
Wonderjudge.
